locations: fr, france, ile-de-france, vélizy-villacoublay, 78140, rue paul dautier, 7, 48.7806852, 2.2124914
short_description: fichet bauche is a hardware store based in vélizy-villacoublay, france.
long_description: resulting from the merger between fichet (locksmithing specialist) and bauche (fire protection specialist), our company history goes back almost 200 years. the respective inventions of founders alexandre fichet and auguste-nicolas bauche were landmarks in the history of security and firefighting. their engineering genius and perseverance is what made fichet-bauche a key player in the security world. it established the general principle of unpickable locks, only in need of further improvements. 1840 in 1840, fichet creates his first modern fireproof safe: a double-walled steel safe with a fichet key lock. understanding the growing importance of safes in the field of security, the inventor later never ceased to develop the technology of locks to make them more and more efficient. 1864 firebrick factory owner henri bauche starts building safes in gueux (eastern france). a great name in the safe industry was born, joining forces to produce safes, fire-resistant and other security cabinets and many of the most sought-after security solutions on the market.
business_tags: security cabinets | fire proof safes | wall safe | small safes | security door | large safes | double doors | fire protection | wooden box | keys and locks | refractory materials | express repair | user experience | b2b sales | history & home | repair services | fire resistance
generated_description: fichet bauche is a company based in versailles, ile-de-france, specializing in the design and manufacture of safes, security cabinets, and vaults. the company emerged from the merger of fichet, a locksmithing specialist, and bauche, a fire protection specialist, with a history spanning almost 200 years. fichet bauche is known for its technical expertise, innovation, and commitment to quality. the company produces a wide range of products, including a2p-certified safes, fireproof safes, and various security cabinets, catering to sectors such as luxury retail, large-scale distribution, defense, banking, public authorities, hospitals, and pharmacies.
